attributes.action: Support and Help Vulnerable Homeless People
attributes.additional_details: I would like for the Government or Parliament to work as a team to support everyone. Not only the over 70s and people with underlining health issues... Homelessness needs to be stopped!
attributes.background: All i see is people and government speak about Elderly/Vulnerable disabled people but never about the vulnerable homeless that are sleeping rough while Covid-19 takes over.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302485

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
